game.name: Life Balance
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A physics-based platformer where life choices become literal baggage. Climb a spiral tower while managing education, career, and family - each decision adds weight that affects your movement. Can you reach the top, or will your responsibilities drag you down?
